info.title: VidSage - YouTube RAG Pipeline API
info.description:
## VidSage - AI-Powered YouTube Video Analysis
    
    A comprehensive RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline API for processing YouTube videos, 
    extracting transcripts, performing semantic search, and generating AI-powered answers.

get.description: Check if the API is running

post.description: Extract transcript, create embeddings, and store in database

get.description: Get all videos processed by the current user

post.description: Add a video to user's library

delete.summary: Delete a video and its chunks
delete.description: Delete a video and all its chunks from the database for the current user.

post.description: Perform semantic search within a video's transcript
Generate an AI-powered answer using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)

get.description: Get statistics about processed videos and embeddings
Get AI-generated questions about a video
Start Google OAuth flow for account integration
Check if user has connected their Google account

delete.description: Revoke Google OAuth access and delete stored tokens

get.description: Retrieve the pre-generated summary for a processed video.

schema.title: Response Get Video Summary Videos  Video Id  Summary Get

post.summary: Save video summary to Google Doc
post.description: Fetches the video summary and saves it as a new Google Doc via the tool API.

schema.title: Response Save Summary To Doc Tools Save Summary To Doc Post

get.summary: Check if video summary is saved to Google Doc
get.description: Checks if a Google Doc for the video summary already exists for the user.

schema.title: Response Get Summary Doc Link Tools Summary Doc Link Get

video_id.title: Video Id
video_id.description: YouTube video ID to search in

top_k.title: Top K
top_k.description: Number of context chunks to retrieve

GenerateRequest.title: GenerateRequest
GenerateRequest.description: Request model for RAG-based answer generation.

example.answer: To grow bigger muscles, focus on progressive overload, proper nutrition with adequate protein intake, and sufficient rest between workouts...

sources.text_preview: Progressive overload is key to muscle growth. You need to gradually increase...

SourceChunk.title: SourceChunk
SourceChunk.description: Source chunk reference in generated answer.
